body.p: Editorial decisions can be assigned to an publisher using an @resp attribute. The value of the @resp attribute is an identifier as a reference, which is resolved in the <teiHeader>.
The attribute @resp can be used in the elements <persName>, <placeName>, <orgName>, <name>, <unclear>, <supplied>, <reg>, <corr>, <expan>.
body.codeblock: <supplied resp="#[ID publisher]">[character string supplemented compared to the original]</supplied>
